targets.queryText:
SELECT created_at, COUNT(medias.id) OVER (ORDER BY medias.created_at ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as nb_movies
FROM medias WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds} AND medias.media_type = 'movie';
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT created_at, COUNT(medias.id) OVER (ORDER BY medias.created_at ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as nb_movies
FROM medias WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds} AND medias.media_type = 'movie';

targets.queryText:
SELECT created_at, SUM(duration) OVER (ORDER BY created_at ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as cumulative_duration
FROM medias WHERE media_type = 'movie' AND created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds};
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT created_at, SUM(duration) OVER (ORDER BY created_at ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as cumulative_duration
FROM medias WHERE media_type = 'movie' AND created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds};

targets.queryText:
SELECT DISTINCT rating || ' *', SUM(count) as sum_count FROM (
  SELECT ROUND(movies.rating) as rating, COUNT(movies.rating) as count 
  FROM movies JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
  WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
  GROUP BY ROUND(movies.rating)
UNION
  SELECT ROUND(series.rating) as rating, COUNT(series.rating) as count 
  FROM series 
    JOIN episodes ON episodes.serie_id = series.id
    JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = episodes.id AND medias.media_type = 'episode'
  WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
  GROUP BY serie_id, ROUND(series.rating)
) GROUP BY rating ORDER BY rating DESC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT DISTINCT rating || ' *', SUM(count) as sum_count FROM (
  SELECT ROUND(movies.rating) as rating, COUNT(movies.rating) as count 
  FROM movies JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
  WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
  GROUP BY ROUND(movies.rating)
UNION
  SELECT ROUND(series.rating) as rating, COUNT(series.rating) as count 
  FROM series 
    JOIN episodes ON episodes.serie_id = series.id
    JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = episodes.id AND medias.media_type = 'episode'
  WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
  GROUP BY serie_id, ROUND(series.rating)
) GROUP BY rating ORDER BY rating DESC

targets.queryText:
SELECT created_at, COUNT(medias.id) OVER (ORDER BY medias.created_at ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as nb_episodes
FROM medias WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds} AND medias.media_type = 'episode';

targets.queryText:

FROM medias WHERE media_type = 'episode' AND created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds};
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT created_at, SUM(duration) OVER (ORDER BY created_at ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as cumulative_duration
FROM medias WHERE media_type = 'episode' AND created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds};

targets.queryText:
SELECT genres.genre, COUNT(genres.genre) as count
FROM genres 
  JOIN mediable_genres ON mediable_genres.genre_id = genres.id
  JOIN movies ON mediable_genres.media_id = movies.id AND mediable_genres.media_type = 'movie'
  JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
WHERE medias.created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY genres.genre
ORDER BY count desc;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT genres.genre, COUNT(genres.genre) as count
FROM genres 
  JOIN mediable_genres ON mediable_genres.genre_id = genres.id
  JOIN movies ON mediable_genres.media_id = movies.id AND mediable_genres.media_type = 'movie'
  JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
WHERE medias.created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY genres.genre
ORDER BY count desc;

targets.queryText:
SELECT people.name, COUNT(people.name) as count
FROM people 
  JOIN people_mediable_relation ON people_mediable_relation.person_id = people.id
  JOIN movies ON people_mediable_relation.media_id = movies.id AND people_mediable_relation.media_type = 'movie'
  JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
WHERE people_mediable_relation.relation = 'director'
  AND medias.created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY people.name
ORDER BY count desc;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT people.name, COUNT(people.name) as count
FROM people 
  JOIN people_mediable_relation ON people_mediable_relation.person_id = people.id
  JOIN movies ON people_mediable_relation.media_id = movies.id AND people_mediable_relation.media_type = 'movie'
  JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
WHERE people_mediable_relation.relation = 'director'
  AND medias.created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY people.name
ORDER BY count desc;

targets.queryText:

  JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
WHERE people_mediable_relation.relation = 'credit'
  AND medias.created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY people.name
ORDER BY count desc;

  AND medias.created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY people.name
ORDER BY count desc;

targets.queryText:
SELECT CAST(ROUND(movies.rating) AS text) as rating, COUNT(rating) as count 
FROM movies JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY ROUND(movies.rating)
ORDER BY movies.rating DESC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT CAST(ROUND(movies.rating) AS text) as rating, COUNT(rating) as count 
FROM movies JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY ROUND(movies.rating)
ORDER BY movies.rating DESC

targets.queryText:
SELECT movies.year, COUNT(year) as count 
FROM movies JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY ROUND(movies.year)
ORDER BY movies.year

targets.queryText:
SELECT people.name, COUNT(people.name) as count
FROM people 
  JOIN people_mediable_relation ON people_mediable_relation.person_id = people.id
  JOIN movies ON people_mediable_relation.media_id = movies.id AND people_mediable_relation.media_type = 'movie'
  JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = movies.id AND medias.media_type = 'movie'
WHERE people_mediable_relation.relation = 'actor'
  AND medias.created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY people.name
ORDER BY count desc;

WHERE medias.created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY genres.genre

targets.queryText:

FROM episodes JOIN medias ON medias.media_id = episodes.id AND medias.media_type = 'episode'
WHERE created_at BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
GROUP BY ROUND(episodes.rating)
ORDER BY episodes.rating DESC
